column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Un-freaking-believable!  Art on steroids!  My friend and I toured this place for about 4 hours
column2: and honestly we probably rushed through a number of areas because there is just that much to see.  So many amazing pieces I never imagined seeing in person
column3: pieces I had studied in school once upon a time.  Wear comfortable shoes
column4: my feet seriously felt like they were going to fall off
column5: and I was in pretty comfortable boots.
